price: Hakika yeye ni katika waja wetu walio amini.
footnotes: Hakika yeye ni miongoni mwa waja wetu walio tuamini, na wakatimiza ahadi yetu, na wakaufikisha Ujumbe wetu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
